tweet: An anniversary is a day that commemorates and/or celebrates a past event that occurred on the same day of the year as the initial event
For example, the first event is the initial occurrence or, if planned, the inaugural of the event
The word was first used for Catholic feasts to commemorate saints
Most countries around the world celebrate national anniversaries, for example the United States Bicentennial.
These could be the date of independence of the nation or the adoption of a new constitution or form of government
